name: Launch Templates With Disk Configuration Should Encrypt the Disks
description: Launch templates providing storage configurations should have encryption enabled for the disks
body: VM templates that specify storage configuration should enforce encrypted disks.
remediationDescription:
1﻿. Open the Launch Template in the AWS Console using the dedicated button
2. Select the actions menu and select `Modify template (Create new version)`
3﻿. Scroll down to `Storage (Volumes)`
4.﻿ For each `EBS Volume` set `Encrypted` to `Encrypted`
5﻿. Use the new launch template version instead of the old one 
5﻿. Delete the old template version
